text: Erzya or Erzia may refer to: *Erzya language, a Uralic language spoken in Russia *Erzya literature, literature written in the Erzya language *Erzyan Mastor, a splinter group from the Mastorava religion *Erzyan Mastor (journal), an Erzyan- and Russian-language bilingual newspaper *Erzya people *Stepan Erzia (1876–1959), Mordvin sculptor who lived in Russia ==See also== *Erza (disambiguation)
title: Erzya
